creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Margaret McMillan Webber in memory of her mother, Katherine Kittredge McMillan
inscription: Text is Persian; black ink is in naskhi script, red title headings are in thulth script
medium: Ink, opaque watercolor, and gold on paper
text: Moses overpowers Pharaoh with the aid of a dragon, a  theme that is drawn from the Bible. The inclusion of the dragon reflects a Chinese influence.
title: Moses Prevailing over Pharaoh
